abstract: Apple, which has stumbled in its efforts to get into social media, has talked with Twitter in recent months about making a strategic investment in it, according to people briefed on the matter.
snippet: Apple, which has stumbled in its efforts to get into social media, has talked with Twitter in recent months about making a strategic investment in it, according to people briefed on the matter.
lead_paragraph: Apple, which has stumbled in its efforts to get into social media, has talked with Twitter in recent months about making a strategic investment in it, according to people briefed on the matter.

headline.main: Apple Officials Said to Consider Stake in Twitter
headline.print_headline: Apple Officials Said to Consider Stake in Twitter

byline.original: By Evelyn M. Rusli and Nick Bilton
